title: Pixel 3a touchscreen suddenly went unresponsive while using golf rival app. Finger sensor active.
content: Touch screen is not responding at all. Finger sensor is active. I did (1) restart by long pressing power button, (2) restart by long pressing power and volume down buttons at the same time, (3) bootloaded, (4) cleaned and pressed screen, sensor and whole body, (5) kept in cool atmosphere, (6) kept switched off for a while. However, still problem persists. Please help at the earliest. Thanks..
